channel.title: Muju-gun on Every Corner of Korea

item.title: Muju, where have you been? - Muju-gun, Jeonbuk, Korea
item.description:
Muju Bandiland

Muju, where have you been?

Muju-gun, Jeonbuk, Korea

In winter, mountaineers who want to enjoy snowy country from skiers become paralyzed. However, Muju is a good trip even for those who do not have eye contact. This is because there are various places to see and eat that were not thought. I am meeting the charm of Muju hidden for you who are curious about the unique appearance of Muju outside of Deogyusan.
Here instead of Fabre insects, Bandiland
Fireflies light up tail lights only in clean areas. Muju is the place that has the most signals to indicate that it is clear water, clean air, and unpolluted land. Why is it that Bandiland is located in Muju?
Bondiland is a place where you can see various insects in your eyes. This is a customized, hands-on learning space for children. In addition to the largest insect museum in Korea, where you can meet rare insects in a large space of more than 120,000㎡, there are various facilities such as youth camping ground, natural recreation forest facility, firefly natural school, and astronomical science museum.
Muju Bandiland
The main experience center here is the Insect Museum. From the entrance, various insect models approach the children's curiosity and awaken adult's conscience.
Insect world is also amazing for adults
At the entrance of the museum, a model of a firefly, representing Muju, keeps its center cool. The main entrance to the main exhibition hall, which is located in the basement, is mysterious, creating an atmosphere that enters the cave with typical fauna and flora fossils from the Paleozoic to the New Saengdae.
Firefly model perched at the entrance
As its name suggests, it is full of insects from Muju, the world's first insects in Korea. Even for those who are not friendly with insects, this is a curious paradise.
Children looking closely at the butterfly model
There are various exhibits from the birth of the earth through insects, the story of dinosaurs from the past, and the realistic and mysterious evolution of vertebrates. In addition, the 3D stereoscopic video room and the dome screen video room where you can lie down to watch the world of insects are fun.
Children focusing on their exhibits
Meet the soul of Taekwondo, Taekwondowon
Taekwondo, representing Korea. The sacred place of Taekwondo is right in Muju. Muju Taekwondowon, the only specialty Taekwondo space in Korea and abroad, is half the size of Yeouido. It is a dream place for the world's taekwondo people who have everything about taekwondo, including not only museums but also international games, experiences, training, education, and research.
Taekwondo Museum where you can learn about Taekwondo
Everything from the spirit of Taekwondo to the fields of technology and the history of the development of Taekwondo can be seen at the National Taekwondo Museum. From the military martial arts of ancient Korean nationalism to the folk martial arts of the Joseon Dynasty, and to the present, the history of Taekwondo is melted in a three-dimensional exhibition space. In addition, Yap! Is a hands-on experience hall where you can experience the T1 performance hall where you can see your skills and skills. There is a `` challenge for challenge '', so visitors can go one step closer to Taekwondo.
Robot Taekwon V visits Taekwondo Museum
If you have plenty of time, take a look around Taekwondowon. If you take the shuttle bus in front of the challenge field, you can see Taekwondowon with a friendly announcement.
Monorail to the observatory
For the taekwondo people's training, they arrive at the entrance of the observatory through the traditional garden, Hoyeonjeong, after a leap where the accommodation and fitness facilities are arranged.
Nicely made gazebo
You can use a monorail or hiking trail to the observation deck. The view of Taekwondowon, which is in harmony with the surrounding mountains, from the panoramic observation deck is also an attractive point.
From the observation deck on the third floor, you can enjoy the scenery of Muju.
Gourmet vanity only steamed! 'White Island Geumgang Freshwater'
There is a restaurant that you only want to know. “White Island Geumgang Freshwater” is such a place for old regulars. But a good restaurant is rumored someday no matter how hidden. There is a visitor who misses this place from Chungcheong area near to Seoul from far away. Also, after the visitor writer Heo Young-man visited the house, he became more famous as a restaurant restaurant.
Pagasari Spicy Bath
The menu that makes this place famous is eoju porridge and pagasari spice soup. Depending on which vegetables and seasonings are used, the main taste is different, so it is not the right answer. However, every year, the deep taste of the three-time beats, including the sincerity of drying the radish finely, the deep hand taste from the soaked intestine, and the fresh flesh of the fresh fish, are stimulated by the tip of the tongue.
Unusual sujebi in Maeuntang
Another secret that this house is famous for is the sincerity of the health of its guests. Make all the side dishes yourself and do not use any seasonings. Boil the broth with 3 years old camphor ginseng from Geumsan, Chungnam. In addition, the use of persimmon tree, also known as rumors and medicinal trees, as a broth material is good for bones.
Ginseng is made with every effort to make ginseng
Let's plan a Muju trip for a healthy body and mind on the last weekend of January. Exciting trips for children and exciting trips for adults.
Deep-fried freshwater prawns with taste and price
